channel.title: flame-graph on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in flame-graph on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: go 火焰图分析
item.description: go version go1.11.1 darwin/amd64 安装: 1 2 3 $ go get github.com/uber/go-torch $ cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/uber/go-torch $ git clone https://github.com/brendangregg/FlameGraph.git 安装测试工具 1 2 3 $ go get github.com/Masterminds/glide $ cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/uber/go-torch $ glide install 性能分析工具 glide install如果出现 Update failed for golang.org/x/sys: Cannot detect VCS 这种报错,
